channel.title: Posts on Ashton Bradley

item.title: Sukla Pal goes to Nottingham
item.description: Sukla Pal is going to a research fellow position at the University of Nottingham. All the best for your new research!

item.title: Assistant Professor Xiaoquan Yu
item.description: Xiaoquan Yu got a faculty job at Graduate School of China Academy of Engineering Physics in Beijing. Congrats!
